price: 6. Mais il y avait ceux, parmi les humains, qui cherchaient refuge auprès des djinns. Or ceux-ci ne firent qu’ajouter à leur perdition.
arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ رِجَالٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡإِنسِ يَعُوذُونَ بِرِجَالٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ فَزَادُوهُمۡ رَهَقٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-annahu kāna rijālun mina al-insi yaʿūdhūna birijālin mina al-jini fazādūhum rahaqan
